headline: PPL Equity Units Fuel Expanded Grid Spend For Hyperscaler Data Demand
summary: PPL Corporation (NYSE:PPL) has launched a $1b public offering of Equity Units. The company has raised its four year capital expenditure plan. New spending is centered on grid upgrades to support hyperscaler data centers and large load customers. PPL is working with Blackstone Infrastructure in a joint venture focused on supplying power to hyperscalers. The company is also expanding interconnection agreements with large power users. For investors, this move places NYSE:PPL in the flow of...

headline: PPL's employee giving campaign raises $10 million to improve lives and strengthen communities
summary: PPL Corporation employees and retirees, together with matching contributions from PPL's affiliated foundations, pledged $10 million during PPL's annual employee-led charitable giving campaign. These contributions will support more than 500 local nonprofit organizations in communities served by PPL's utilities, with local United Ways helping to ensure funds are directed to areas of greatest need.
